data.actual_result: It's greyed out until you tap it again
data.expected_result: the button isn't greyed out in the first place
data.short_description: Alert frequency weirdly greyed out in channel settings when on @mentions only
data.steps_to_repro: - Go into a channel you haven't tried this yet - Get into its settings by pressing the channel name on top - see how the Only @mentions radio button is greyed out - Press the greyed out button
